it.polimi.se2019.model

Class KillScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.KillScoreBoard

  • public class KillScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    KillScoreBoard contains all data related to global deaths and scores

      • addOverKill

        public void addOverKill(java.lang.Boolean overkill)
        An overkill lets the player add one more mark on the scoreboard, but doesn't consume a skull
        Parameters:
        overkill - the player who scores the overkill

      • gameRunning

        public boolean gameRunning()
        Returns:
        true when there are available skulls on the scoreboard, false otherwise

      • resolveScoreboard

        public void resolveScoreboard()
        Resolves the scoreboard, summing up each kill and assigning each player his score
